description: After a trying day in the office, Colt Rivers is looking to let loose. He reaches out to his friend Joey Rico to hit the town with him and enjoy a guy’s night out. Once home, Colt realizes the idea of a night out might not be what he really wants and upon seeing Joey Rico he decides that all he wants is a night in getting naked with Joey. Joey needs no persuasion and agrees with Colt’s plan to blow each other as opposed to blowing off some steam.
title: Corporate Welcome
